Module.Name: Consumer product concentration distributions
Module.Description: Consumer product concentration distributions are specified by a mean, cv and distribution type (lognormal). Specify the occurrence percentage i.c. the percentage of the consumer product with positive concentrations.
Module.ShortDescription: Consumer product concentration distributions are specified by summary statistics. Consumer product concentration distributions can be given as data or computed from consumer product concentrations.
Module.DataDescription: Data are provided in the form of summary statistics for a specific consumer product and substance.
Module.CalculationDescription: Consumer product concentration distributions are computed from consumer product concentrations.
